command.description: Re-processes all images in an image set and queues them for CDN upload.

option.name: verbose
option.description: Set verbosity level. Use multiples for more detail (e.g. "-vv".)

option.name: cdn
option.description: Don't queue images for upload to CDN after processing.

argument.name: image_set
argument.description: The image set shortname to re-process.

argument.name: dsn
argument.description: Database DSN in MDB2 format (e.g. pgsql://username@host/database).
